state.content: You are a helpful assistant.

You are given few useful crafting recipes to craft items in Minecraft. Crafting commands are of the format "craft [target object] using [input ingredients]".
Every round I will give you an observation, you have to respond an action based on the state and instruction. You can "get" an object (ingredients) from the inventory or the environment, look-up the game inventory by "inventory", or "craft" (target) using any of the crafting commands. You can use ONLY these crafting commands provided, do not use your own crafting commands. However, if the crafting command uses a generic ingredient like "planks", you can use special types of the same ingredient e.g. "dark oak planks" in the command instead.
Your response should use the following format:

Thought:
 ... 

Action:
 ...
Ok.

Crafting commands:
craft 1 acacia button using 1 acacia planks
craft 1 stick using 2 bamboo
craft 1 bow using 3 stick, 3 string
craft 1 cartography table using 4 planks, 2 paper
craft 4 crimson planks using 1 crimson stems
craft 4 jungle planks using 1 jungle logs
craft 4 oak planks using 1 oak logs
craft 4 dark oak planks using 1 dark oak logs

craft 1 jukebox using 8 planks, 1 diamond
craft 3 acacia sign using 6 acacia planks, 1 stick
craft 4 acacia planks using 1 acacia logs
craft 1 jungle fence gate using 4 stick, 2 jungle planks
craft 1 brown banner using 6 brown wool, 1 stick
craft 3 acacia door using 6 acacia planks
craft 4 spruce planks using 1 spruce logs
craft 4 warped planks using 1 warped stems
craft 1 yellow bed using 3 yellow wool, 3 planks
craft 4 stick using 2 planks
craft 3 warped fence using 2 stick, 4 warped planks
craft 3 spruce sign using 6 spruce planks, 1 stick
